municipal_registration.title: Municipal Registration
municipal_registration.description: Register with local authorities for stays over 3 months
steps: Submit registration forms and supporting paperwork

work_contract_processing.title: Work Contract Processing
work_contract_processing.description: Ensure your work contract is valid and properly issued
steps: Confirm contract is issued by Belgian employer
Make copies of the original contract
Store contract safely for future reference

health_insurance_setup.title: Health Insurance Setup
health_insurance_setup.description: Secure health insurance coverage for the duration of your stay

belgian_bank_account_creation.title: Belgian Bank Account Creation
belgian_bank_account_creation.description: Open a bank account in Belgium to receive wages
steps: Research banks offering accounts for seasonal workers
Schedule an appointment with chosen bank
Receive account details and banking information
